alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bladen and northeastern Robeson Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Pauls, or 10 miles north of Lumberton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Pauls, Smiths, Rex, Howellsville, Tolarsville, Duart, Robeson Community College, Tobermory, Barker Ten Mile, Jerome, Parkton, Rennert, and Tar Heel. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 22 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
